title: [Question] Option entry list. Is this good enough
content:
(All the college are cs related branch)

1 = rvce
2 = rvce(ec)
3 = pes(rr)
4 = msrit 
5 = pes(ec)
6 = bmsce
7 = sjce
8= vvce
9 = nie

Any colleges to be added ( I only care about placements not infrastructure or anything) I will be clearly getting ec campus of pes is rr cutoff varies a lot.....

comments.body:
My suggestion would be make bmsce above ec campus 

And everything is perfect
Bruhh but when I saw the faq's they said ec and rr exactly the same except the peer group and it's better only then rr in hackathons??? Can somebody just confirm it one last time...
Bro you ain't gotta discriminate ec campus like that,the placements are same for both the campuses are you a bit slow in the head?
My humble opinion after asking people in the pes discord server
Either put MSRIT above PES(RR) or below PES(EC).. placing it in between these 2 makes no sense as both campuses are the same...
yeah your right peer grp will be the only difference which isnt that big... hackathons are more in RR but EC students are also allowed
